title: Bush on the 1990 Gulf War - similarity

content.question: The principles on human rights articulated by President Bush are most similar to

choices.label: the ideas expressed by President George Washington in his 1796 Farewell Address
President James K. Polk’s support for Manifest Destiny in the 1840s
the ideas expressed by President Woodrow Wilson during and after the First World War
President Ronald Reagan’s support for reinvigoration of anticommunism in the 1980s

content.answer: the ideas expressed by President Woodrow Wilson during and after the First World War

topic.text: 7.5: World War I - Military and Diplomacy

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
